commit message: Update README.md (App published)
Fix some null pointer exceptions
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
Move AppsListItem class from helper package to model
Replace all listeners in CacheManager with OnActionListener
Move all UI code from CacheManager to CleanerActivity
Add ability to clean cache on device boot up
Small changes in CacheManager's API
Small bug fix
Update Build Tools and Support libraries versions
Force on*Started() listeners to run on the UI thread

CleanerService: Delay self-kill

Delay self-kill, so Toast has enough time to appear and disappear

Force app to install in internal storage

Installing app to SD card would broke clean up on device boot up
Update translations
Fix small bugs in UI
Update storage usage more often
Small performance improvement
CacheManager: State should be changed before calling on*Completed()
CacheManager: Use AsyncTask instead of Thread for better performance
AppsListAdapter: Fix of potential bug

CacheManager: Add onScanProgressUpdated
CleanerActivity: Show number of scanned apps in progress bar
Cache Cleaner v1.1
